original: 已遣人執行 <color=#bceea7>$city1</color>打草驚蛇計謀完美成功，清除了城內所有的細作並加強巡邏<color=#bceea7>12</color>個月！
text: Someone has been dispatched to execute the <color=#bceea7>$city1</color> strategy of killing the grass and scaring the snake perfectly. It cleared all the details in the city and strengthened patrols for <color=#bceea7>12</color> months!
